News.Title: Sigma Solve Reports IPO Fund Deviation for Q3 FY26
News.Summary: Sigma Solve Limited disclosed deviation in IPO fund utilization for Q3 FY26, with ₹31.57 lakhs from public issue expenses reallocated to general corporate purposes following shareholder approval.

News.Title: Sigma Solve Q3FY26 Results: Net Profit Jumps 75.7%
News.Summary: Sigma Solve Limited reported strong Q3FY26 results with consolidated net profit rising 75.7% YoY to ₹670.05 lakh. Revenue from operations grew 26.3% to ₹2,472.93 lakh, driven by robust business performance.

News.Title: Sigma Solve Q3 EBITDA Jumps 30% to ₹78 Million
News.Summary: Sigma Solve reports strong Q3 performance with EBITDA rising 30% year-on-year to ₹78 million, while EBITDA margin improved to 31.71% from 30.58% in the previous year.

News.Title: Sigma Solve Q3 Revenue Jumps 26% to ₹247 Million
News.Summary: Sigma Solve reported strong quarterly performance with revenue rising to ₹247 million in Q3 compared to ₹196 million in the same period last year, marking a significant 26% year-on-year growth.

News.Title: Sigma Solve Q3 Net Profit Jumps 60% to ₹67 Crores
News.Summary: Sigma Solve reported consolidated net profit of ₹67 crores in Q3, marking a significant 60% year-on-year growth from ₹42 crores in the same quarter last year.

News.Title: Sigma Solve Board Meet on Jan 13 for Q3FY26 Results
News.Summary: Sigma Solve Limited has scheduled a board meeting on January 13, 2026, to approve Q3FY26 financial results. Trading window closed from January 1 until 48 hours post-announcement.

News.Title: Sigma Solve Receives ₹5,900 NSE Penalty for Compliance Delay
News.Summary: Sigma Solve Limited disclosed receiving a ₹5,900 penalty from NSE for delayed related party transaction upload due to technical issues. The company has applied for penalty waiver.
